channel.title: How to Upload SMF or a WPS to Ulmb
channel.description:
I Figured out a very quick way to Upload a WPS (Web Portal System) or SMF (Simple Machines Forum) Without using a FTP Client.
Go into the File manager of ULMB where it says automatically unzip files. Check that. Then upload your SMF or WPS then it should upload. And auto Extract it. Then rename it to w/e directory you want :)
Please note that this is untested ;) ~Wonderguy6.

wont alow files over 2mb or even files for that matter

[/quote]Hahaha, that’s probably the biggest bullshit ever. They offer so much, but with shit like that… It’s annoying.[/quote]

i know lol i posted on there forum and they said that they don’t alow files over 2mb files to be uploaded through the CP ftp wont connect/work they wont like the files that make vb rum no file with no extension are allowed mdf files nope and a load of other ones …
